name: Solar system (itch) (Rayed Jamal)
description:
Just the requirements for the coursera course Im currently taking. It includes every planet - not pluto though, since I used the textures for pluto for the comets that spawn.  And yes, the scale is quite off, but I mean, cmon now.

You can click on each planet to focus on it, also

Made entirely by Rayed Jamal, all the assets are from MSU
